name: Draining Shot
description: Blast an enemy with an enchanted arrow, dealing 1393 Physical Damage and reducing their movement speed by 60% for 3 seconds.  If the enemy is hit, you heal for 2399.
effectLines: Heals you if enemy is successfully hit, but snares them instead of stunning.
coefDescription: Blast an enemy with an enchanted arrow, dealing $1 Physical Damage and reducing their movement speed by 60% for 3 seconds.  If the enemy is hit, you heal for $2.
rawDescription:
Blast an enemy with an enchanted arrow, dealing <<1>> and reducing their movement speed by <<2>> for <<3>>.

If the enemy is hit, you heal for <<4>>.
